Title: Konjiki no Gash Bell!!: Ougon no Chichi wo Motsu Otoko
Description: ["Folgore - 00F, the world's most ultimate spy is set on retrieving the stolen boobs. Watch as many of the characters from the original series (Konjiki no Gash Bell) are given life anew in this alternate setting."]
